ComicInfo.Title: The Revenge of Bull Barton; The Vow
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Revenge of Bull Barton: Kid Colt prevents a train robbery by Bull's gang and the governor offers to grant him a pardon if he can go one day without using his guns. Colt agrees but has to take up his guns to save the governor from Bull's gang, forcing him to remain an outlaw.
The Vow: Jim promises to look over Tom's son as Tom dies. Because Chance is always making trouble Jim has to keep him in jail to keep him safe.
